metadata.synopsis: The 16th-century English king (Keith Michell) recalls Anne Boleyn (Charlotte Rampling), Jane Seymour and other wives on his deathbed.

reviews: Historical pageants may be fine for high-school graduation ceremonies, but since none of the performers in this film is likely to be your son or daughter, why bother with it?
With yeoman direction by Waris Hussein, the film is, in sum, a thinking-man's spectacular, with something, of course, to please even the non-thinkers.
